albums.name: Albums
albums.description: Albums are used to store your stamps within a binder and make up part of a Stamp Collection.

catalogues.name: Catalogues
catalogues.description: The stamp catalogue is a reference book that lists the stamps of a country or region and provides information on their values, design and history.

countries.name: Countries
countries.description: Country represents the official postal authority that issued stamps for postal purposes. These include post offices in foreign countries and postal services organised by military occupations, colonies and revolutionary movements.

sellers.name: Sellers
sellers.description:
Sellers represent the selling agent for stamps and philatelic items. The seller could be an
    auction house, stamp dealer, association/society or an individual.

stamps.name: Stamps
stamps.description: Stamps represent the physical postal item issued by an official postal authority.

stamp-collections.name: Stamp Collections
stamp-collections.description: Stamp Collections is where you can manage your Stamp Collections allowing you to organize your albums.
